sentences.en: A crafty knave needs no broker.
sentences.cn: 狡猾的无赖无需中间人.

sentences.en: A factor differs from a broker in that he may sell in his own name.
sentences.cn: 代理商与经纪人的区别是他可以以自己的名义出售货物.

sentences.en: A good rule of thumb is that a broker must generate sales of ten times his salary if his employer is to make a profit.
sentences.cn: 根据经验来看，如果雇主要获得利润，那么其代理商必须卖出相当于其工资10倍的销售额。

sentences.en: All I know is that he is a broker with several accounts in his pocket.
sentences.cn: 我只知道他是个掮客,口袋里有好几本帐.

sentences.en: He baited the broker by promises of higher commissions.
sentences.cn: 他答应给更高的佣金来引诱那位经纪人.

sentences.en: He smiled grimly and hurried into the " private den " next door to ring up the broker.
sentences.cn: 他狞笑了一声,就匆匆地跑到办公室隔壁的 “ 机要房 ” 打电话去了.

sentences.en: He was a high-earning broker with money to burn.
sentences.cn: 他是高收入的经纪人，有花不完的钱。

sentences.en: It was improper of the broker to withhold the information from the stock exchange.
sentences.cn: 股票经纪人对交易所隐瞒信息的行为是不正当的.

sentences.en: It's part of the service on the broker's side, isn't it?
sentences.cn: 这是经纪人应该承担的责任, 不是 吗 ?

sentences.en: Jackson had been a major power-broker in the 1988 Presidential elections.
sentences.cn: 杰克逊是1988年总统选举中举足轻重的权力经纪人。

sentences.en: She's a hotshot broker on Wall Street.
sentences.cn: 她是华尔街一名业绩斐然的经纪人。

sentences.en: Shipping any stuff into Isreael blows any image we may have of an honest broker.
sentences.cn: 把任何东西运进以色列都会毁掉我们作为诚实无诈的中间人的形象.

sentences.en: The selling broker is then required to assign a portion of the commission to the buyer broker.
sentences.cn: 卖方经纪人须随后将部分佣金分给买方经纪人。

sentences.en: The stock - broker was hard hit by the fall in stocks.
sentences.cn: 由于股票下跌,这个股票经纪人受到了严重打击.

sentences.en: Vincent French is a real estate broker at the sharp end of a tough and exacting business.
sentences.cn: 文森特·弗伦奇在房地产这个艰难行业做了最吃苦受累的不动产经纪人。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 报关行；海关经纪人
房地产经纪人，不动产经纪人
证券经纪人，股票经纪人

trans.tran_en: someone who buys and sells things such as  share s  in companies or foreign money for other people
